text: 15.45 Stt 2.7, Jon 6.33, 6.39-40, 6.54, 6.63, 2 Ko 3.4-6, 3.17, Plp 3.21 Buk Baybol abe tɨkɨl anɨb agak, Bɨ ned nɨb Adam ak, God ne nop gek koŋɨm yek agɨl tɨkak. Pen Adam kɨdek ak,15.45 Bɨ Adam kɨdek ak, nɨm Klays nep. 1 Kolin 15.21-22 ayɨp, Lom 5.14-19 ayɨp nɨgɨnɨmɨn. ne ke kawnan ak nɨm, binɨb gek koŋɨm mɨdɨl pelpel mɨdebal.
